participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: family-oriented and playful, enjoys spending quality time with loved ones.
participant_1.background: my wife and kids are the best. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate. i've three children. i'm a plumber. i love going to the park with my three children and my wife.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: adventurous and outgoing, loves sports and enjoys a good meal.
participant_2.background: i'm a construction worker. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. i have been working since i was sixteen years old. my favorite food is mexican food.

content.text: mexican food is a little boring no ?
no, my favorite is chocolate. what about you?
